üåç Cultivating an International Business Perspective: The Cornerstone of Opportunity Pursuit üöÄ As the Global Business Development Advisor at FIMER S.p.A., I have had the privilege of witnessing the profound impact that an international business perspective can have on our organization's pursuit of opportunities. Today, I would like to share why fostering this perspective is not just important but essential for our continued success. In an increasingly interconnected world, the boundaries of business are no longer confined by geographic limits. Opportunities for growth, innovation, and expansion often transcend borders. Here's why embracing an international business perspective is crucial in our pursuit of these opportunities: üí° Access to Diverse Markets: An international business perspective allows us to tap into diverse markets across the globe. By understanding the unique needs, preferences, and cultural nuances of different regions, we can tailor our products and services to resonate with a broader customer base. ‚ö° Resilience through Diversification: Relying solely on a single market or region can be risky. Economic fluctuations, political instability, or unforeseen events can impact our business. An international approach helps us diversify our revenue streams, making us more resilient in the face of adversity. üí° Innovation and Collaboration: Innovation often thrives at the intersection of different ideas and perspectives. Collaborating with partners, customers, and experts from around the world can lead to groundbreaking innovations that propel us ahead of the competition. ‚ö° Competitive Advantage: In a globalized economy, competitors are not limited to local players. To stay competitive, we must be prepared to compete on an international stage. An international business perspective gives us a strategic advantage in this arena. üí° Risk Mitigation: Understanding international dynamics and risks is essential for making informed decisions. An international perspective allows us to identify potential risks early and develop strategies to mitigate them effectively. At FIMER S.p.A., we are committed to being at the forefront of the energy transition, and an international business perspective is integral to achieving this mission. By embracing the diversity of markets and opportunities worldwide, we position ourselves for sustainable growth and long-term success. #fimer #innovation #management #technology

By Invitation only programs from the private markets: What they are and why they exist. Invitation-only programs from the private markets are exclusive programs that are only available to a select group of individuals. These programs can offer a variety of benefits, such as access to exclusive investment opportunities, mentorship from experienced investors, and networking opportunities with other high-net-worth individuals. There are a few reasons why invitation-only programs from the private markets exist. First, these programs are often designed to give investors access to exclusive investment opportunities. Private markets are not publicly traded, so they can be more difficult to access for individual investors. Invitation-only programs can provide investors with a way to invest in private markets without having to go through a traditional financial advisor. Second, invitation-only programs can offer mentorship from experienced investors. This can be a valuable resource for investors who are new to private markets or who want to learn more about a particular investment strategy. Third, invitation-only programs can provide networking opportunities with other high-net-worth individuals. This can be beneficial for investors who are looking to build relationships with potential investors or partners. Invitation-only programs from the private markets are not without their critics. Some people argue that these programs are elitist and that they exclude less wealthy investors. Others argue that these programs are opaque and that it is difficult to know how they select their members. Despite these criticisms, invitation-only programs from the private markets remain popular among investors. These programs can offer a number of benefits, such as access to exclusive investment opportunities, mentorship from experienced investors, and networking opportunities with other high-net-worth individuals. If you are interested in joining an invitation-only program from the private markets, there are a few things you can do. First, you can network with people who are already involved in private markets. Second, you can reach out to private equity firms and venture capital firms directly. Third, you can search for invitation-only programs online. It is important to note that invitation-only programs are not a guarantee of success. Investors should always do their own research before investing in any private market investment. Over the last 6 weeks, I have had the opportunity to work as an Investment Consultant Intern at LCP. I would like to take this chance to say thank you to everyone at LCP for making my time there both professionally and personally a very rewarding and memorable experience. I got to experience first-hand their dedication and commitment to their people and their clients through being involved in a number of projects and client work, such as attending a client research meeting and completing monthly valuations of asset managers. In addition to developing my technical knowledge, I developed key skills which will prove invaluable as I continue my undergraduate degree and look to start my career. Particularly, providing a performance review of the main asset classes at the LCP Investment Monthly Conference for June, in front of the investment team, helped to develop my presentation skills. I was given other challenges such as completing various explanation tasks and presenting research surrounding sample pension schemes. Here I used LCP‚Äôs internal research systems to evaluate current asset allocations and suggested my own investment strategy to improve funding deficits and hedging against risks. And for my final project, I researched the UK equity market, assessing how it has performed over the years through evaluating the FTSE indices, All Country World Index and relevant price-to-earnings ratios, before recommending revised asset allocations to UK equities, in the form of a practice Trustee Training Session. This has certainly helped to improve my knowledge surrounding equities, and the general stock markets globally. Understanding how a corporate environment works, observing first-hand the importance of leadership, setting clear objectives, developing and supporting people and having an unwavering focus on providing clients with best-in-class advice, are things that I can confidently say I have learnt here at LCP and can actively take into the next stage of my life. Being able to embrace the fabulous, supportive culture at LCP has made my time here unforgettable and I would once again like to thank everyone for their time and support. I truly believe LCP are making a positive difference to the market‚Ä¶ through ‚Äòpowering possibility‚Äô.
